remarks: Express bijection for a mapping operation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2016.)
statement:
fmpt.1 $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> C ) $.
f1ompt $p |- ( F : A -1-1-onto-> B <-> ( A. x e. A C e. B /\ A. y e. B E! x e. A y = C ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C y $.
$d F y $.
